author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Initial pass at migrating data transfer to use a Manifest/Transport approach instead of simple Objects. Basic local drag/drop and copy/paste has been tested, but not thoroughly, and native integration has not been tested at all yet.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Fix minor bug in clipboard and drag/drop behavior.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add MIMEType utility class; move pivot.wtk.Decorator to pivot.wtk.effects; move card pane "orientation" style to intrinsic property; remove component graphics from pivot.wtk package to reduce download size (these can be re-added later to an external JAR, if necessary); remove ComponentInfo annotation - the only value it contained was the name of the component's icon, which can be inferred from the component class name.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add PlainTextSerializer; fix minor bug in CSVSerializer. Stub out possible APIs for expanding clipboard and drag/drop support.
